snippet: Sony on Friday warned that batteries in some of its new Vaio laptop computers may burn or catch fire and asked owners to stop using the units in question.
abstract: Sony warns of potential for batteries to catch fire in some of its new Vaio laptop computers; asks owners to stop using them immediately.
lead_paragraph: Sony on Friday warned that batteries in some of its new Vaio laptop computers may burn or catch fire and asked owners to stop using the units in question.

headline.main: Sony Warns Some New Laptop Batteries May Catch Fire
headline.print_headline: Sony Says Batteries Could Catch Fire in Laptops
